p: The latest genetic data on MeV strains circulating in Cameroon have been known since 1994 [ 14] and were updated in 2001 [ 15] and 2011 [ 16], however they remain fragmented and are relatively old. The aim of this study was to update the MeV strains circulating in Cameroon. These results will enable to establish a genetic basis of virological surveillance in Cameroon and evaluate the countryâ€™s efforts to eradicate this disease.
